name: .AGIF File Extension
summary: Learn about .AGIF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: GIF animation created with Active GIF Creator, a program for creating and optimizing animated .GIF images; contains a sequence of images that can be viewed and edited with Active GIF Creator.

content: NOTE: Active GIF Creator projects are saved with an ".agif" extension, while the final animated GIF files are exported with the standard ".gif" extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
